This place has got to be the best hot pot spot I've tried and this includes Chinatown in Chicago.

Several people went out to eat and most were happy with their food and service.  I ordered the Kung Pao Tofu and expected it to be hot and spicy.  It was...
Great spot for family (friend) dining. The servings are large and great to share. Tons of hot pot choices, from order sets to a la carte. Variety of soup...
